content.title: Uses
content.description: The seeds are edible after toasting and taste like Chestnuts- oil is used Medicinally. Timber yielding. Bark is useful to make rope. Oil contains cyclopropene fatty acids namely 8,9-methylene-heptadec-8-enoic acid (malvalic) and 9,10-methylene-octadec-9-enoic acid (sterculic). Hence, it could be used as biodiesel. Leaf extract has anti-inflammatory activity.
